title: Free Groceries for Five Days
summary: Polymarket is opening a free grocery store in NYC. Is this a jab at Mayor Zohran Mamdani, or actually a good idea? Jessica Tarlov and Aaron Parnas weigh in, on Raging Moderates.
transcript_html:
[00:00]

Poly Market is getting in on the kind of online fun at least. So, they have this free grocery store popup situation in New York City. It's only going to be open for 5 days starting on February 12th. Mom Donniey's responded about it. Uh, what do you make of these kind of like viral marketing stunts playing into Mom Donniey's cuz like they're taking a shot at mom Donnie, right, in how they're doing it. >> I actually think they're helping him. Oh, >> any blowback this gets, any negative coverage this gets, it'll be like, okay, it's a poly market company where Don Jr. or whatever like Republicans are like on

the board of, right? That's just like doing something stupid in New York City. But if it works, Mom Dia will just be like, okay, let's do it again. Great. Give away some food. I mean, like, okay.
